item.description:
OK.  So, you might be on your own for the sex and the drugs. But there's a few different meetups going to Shakespeare on the Common. 

 

We can meetup at the purple shamrock, throw a few back, and then show up for Shakespeare (presence of alcohol in your system enhances the Shakespearian experience, or something).

Also, if the play sucks, we can leave at half time and go throw a few more back! Either way, Shakespeare cannot be enjoyed without a little pregaming!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sitting at the bar. Not that hard to locate plus I'll post my cell the day of.
item.name: Sex, Drugs and Shakespeare
